title: Context of Il Gesu and Triumph . . . Jesus

content.question: Identify the period in which the ceiling was decorated. How did the artistic elements of the ceiling correspond to the historical context when it was decorated?

frqParts.text: Identify the period in which the ceiling was decorated. How did the artistic elements of the ceiling correspond to the historical context when it was decorated?

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
